$interpreted: Lisa: Puggi! Come over here, quick!
Puggi: Puggi puggi puggi~
Lisa: Check this out, Puggi! The quality of this motor oil seems pretty good. How about we buy this as a present for father?
Puggi: Puggi puggi~
Lisa: Good, then I'll buy this. Owner~

Puggi: (Hoho, I thought I was dead meat when that robot took me away.)
(Didn't expect his daughter to be this cute.)

Puggi: (Her figure is voluptuous too.)
(Have been carried around like this for the past few days. This is heaven~)

Lisa: Puggi, I've paid for the item.
Let's go check out the next booth.
Puggi: Puggi puggi~
Lisa: Umm... Excuse me, could you please move a little so we can pass through?
Bandit: Don't be in such a hurry, Missy~ My folks and I just got here. Can you show us around the place?
Lisa: I have no idea who you people are. Go find someone else!

Bandit: Aww, don't be so shy. You'll know us better once you spend some time with us. 
You smell so nice...
Puggi: Ugly bastard, how dare you try to pick up Lisa when I'm present! Do you have a death wish!?

Bandit: What is this fat bird trying to do?
It does look pretty tasty though...
Puggi: Pang, go kick their ***es!
Puggi: ... Oopsy daisy, forget that I've been separated with Pang for days now...

Bandit: All bark and no bite.
Guess I'll turn you into some barbeque chicken first!
Ned: Don't you dare lay a finger on Lisa when I'm around!

Puggi: Even though I have no idea who you are, 
I'll have no objections if you're on my side. Get them!

Puggi: You're pretty good, young fella.
Do you want to be my min...

Ned: Lisa, are you injured?
Did those people frighten you?
Lisa: Of course not, because I knew you would come and protect me.
Puggi: Wait... Are you two?

Ned: Lisa, this bird looks juicy and delicious.
Which hunter did you buy him from?
Lisa: He's not food! Puggi is my friend.
Lisa: Puggi, this is Ned. He's my dear boyfriend~

Puggi: (You have a boyfriend!? So I'm not your only one?)
(Are you telling me that our feelings for the past few days have all been a hoax?)
Puggi: (Am I just acting as a temporary substitute for him?)
Puggi: (If that's how things are, me staying here will cause dear Lisa nothing but awkwardness. I should leave.)
Puggi: Cough cough~ Since it appears that Lisa no longer requires my protection, I guess it's time I resume the search for my partner.

Lisa: What? Are you leaving me, Puggi?
Who are you looking for?
Puggi: A Tiger beast. Even though he's a big dude, I still need to look after him. People's been saying that we two were born to be together.
Puggi: It's been several days since I got separated from him. Maybe he couldn't handle being away from me and has done something stupid...
Lisa: Puggi... I never thought you were...
Lisa: Alright, you should go find him ASAP. Be careful on your trip. If you do find him, don't forget to bring him here so I can take a look!
Puggi: No problem. Once I find him, I will definitely bring him here to say hi to you guys. Goodbye~

Puggi: (In order to fulfill their love,  I voluntarily stepped away from this relationship.)
(Whew~ the self-sacrificing me is so cool!)
Lisa: Ahhh~ A cross-species romance between a Tiger and a Bird, a forbidden love that conquers all obstacles. Splendid; magnificent~

Ned: ... Lisa...
Did something weird just awaken inside you?
